reviewText: Love, love, love. Mesmerized by Linda's performance!
Enjoyed watching friends, Linda and Wade in an entertaining movie. Some really well played scenes and a heart warming ending. Looking forward to watching it again with my wife.

Originally filmed in 1998 Sex, Love and Fantasy has just recently been released on DVD. This intellectual comedy has a great ensemble cast.  Single youth, married middle age, and the wisecracking wisdom of maturity are each represented and are universally recognizable. Shea Whigham is a hoot and the perfect contrast for the urban professionals. How many historical, literary, and pop culture references will resonate with you?
It was cool to see Shea in a comedy.  He and "Emily" were histerical.  Must have been his first big film.
